p: All the analyses were conducted in triplicate using Graph Pad Prism 7 and Origin 8 (Origin Lab—Data analysis and Graphing Software, Szeged, Ungary, https://www.originlab.com/2020b) for depiction and interpretation of the data. The results were expressed as average ±SD. Regarding the in vitro results, one-way ANOVA followed by the Tukey’s post-test was employed to establish the statistical differences between the different experimental and blank groups (* p <0.05, ** p <0.01, *** p <0.001 and **** p <0.0001).
